attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. Balance of 5 year/200 000km Warranty
Last Service - 28/04/2022 @30923km Full Service History

If you looking to save on the cost of fuel the Suzuki Swift is the perfect hatch for you giving you a fuel economy of 4.9l/100km on average and with a full tank you get 755km. This beautiful car has very low mileage. The Swift is perfect for a student or for your first car as it is not a high risk vehicle. Blacked out mirrors and wheels also adds a touch of sportiness to it. Other notable features include invisible rear door handles, USB, Aux jack as well as a D-Shaped steering wheel. Interior is pristine condition with designed stitched seats.


Trade ins Welcome. Finance Available.
Certified Roadworthy Pre-owned.
